title: JSON schema for the TSLint configuration files

align.description: Enforces vertical alignment for parameters, arguments and/or statements

ban.description: Bans the use of specific functions

class-name.description: Enforces PascalCased class and interface names

component-class-suffix.description: Enforces all components having the suffix of 'Component'

component-selector-prefix.description: Enforces all components to have a uniform prefix

component-selector-type.description: Enforces the type of a component

directive-class-suffix.description: Enforces all components having the suffix of 'Directive'

directive-selector-prefix.description: Enforces all directives to have a uniform prefix

directive-selector-type.description: Enforces the type of a directive

eofline.description: Enforces the file to end with a newline

forin.description: Enforces a for...in statement to be filtered with an if statement

interface-name.description: Enforces the rule that interface names must or must not begin with a capital 'I'

jsdoc-format.description: Enforces basic format rules for jsdoc comments

label-position.description: Enforces labels only on sensible statements

label-undefined.description: Checks that labels are defined before usage

max-line-length.description: Sets the maximum length of a line

member-access.description: Enforces using explicit visibility on class members

no-any.description: Disallows usages of any as a type decoration

no-conditional-assignment.description: Disallows any type of assignment in any conditionals; this applies to do-while, for, if, and while statements

no-console.description: Disallows access to the specified functions on console

no-consecutive-blank-lines.description: Disallows having more than one blank line in a row in a file

no-construct.description: Disallows access to the constructors of String, Number and Boolean

no-constructor-vars.description: Disallows the public and private modifiers for constructor parameters

no-duplicate-key.description: Disallows duplicate keys in object literals

no-duplicate-variable.description: Disallows duplicate variable declarations in the same block scope

no-forward-ref.description: Enforces avoidence of utilizing forwardRef's in classes and variables

no-inferrable-types.description: Disallows explicit type declarations for variables or parameters initialized to a number, string, or boolean

no-input-rename.description: Disallows the renaming of input properties

no-internal-module.description: Disallows internal module, use namespace instead

no-output-rename.description: Disallows the renaming of output properties

no-string-literal.description: Disallows object access via string literals

no-trailing-comma.description: Disallows trailing comma within object literals

no-trailing-whitespace.description: Disallows trailing whitespace at the end of a line

no-unreachable.description: Disallows unreachable code after break, catch, throw, and return statements

no-unused-variable.description: Disallows unused imports, variables, functions and private class members

no-use-before-declare.description: Disallows usage of variables before their declaration

no-var-keyword.description: Disallows usage of the var keyword, use let or const instead

no-var-requires.description: Disallows the use of require statements except in import statements

one-line.description: Enforces the specified tokens to be on the same line as the expression preceding it

quotemark.description: Enforces consistent single or double quoted string literals

radix.description: Enforces the radix parameter of parseInt

semicolon.description: Enforces semicolons at the end of every statement

sort-object-literal-keys.description: Checks that keys in object literals are declared in alphabetical order

switch-default.description: Enforces a default case in switch statements

triple-equals.description: Enforces === and !== in favor of == and !=

typedef-whitespace.description: Enforces spacing whitespace for type definitions

use-host-property-decorator.description: Enforces the use of @HostBindings and @HostListeners instead of the host property

use-input-property-decorator.description: Enforces the use of the @Input property decorator instead of the inputs property

use-life-cycle-interface.description: Enforces all life cycle code using the lifecycle hook interfaces

use-output-property-decorator.description: Enforces the use of the @Output property decorator instead of the outputs property

use-pipe-transform-interface.description: Enforces all pipes using the PipeTransform interface

variable-name.description: Allows only camelCased or UPPER_CASED variable names

rulesDirectory.description: The directory where the codelytics rules live
